values: （带帽舌的）便帽；软帽；工作帽；制服帽；学位帽；帽状物；（物品的）保护盖；套；罩；顶部；（经费等的）上限；最高限度；最高限额；（~s）大写字母；火药帽；火药纸；雷管；假牙的齿冠；美齿冠；<俚>毒品丸；海洛因丸；（Cap）卡普；察普（人名）
给…戴帽；给…加盖；给…加顶；包住…末端；笼罩；覆盖；覆盖…的顶部；胜过；超过；盖过；使圆满结束；使圆满完成；除去…的盖子；脱帽致意；脱帽向（某人）致敬；限制…增加；给…定限额；使（兴趣等）达到极点；包（牙）；<俚>买（毒品）；服用（毒品）

（CAP）民间空中巡逻队（Civil Air Patrol的缩写）
；共同农业政策（Common Agricultural Policy的缩写）；计算机辅助生产（computer-aided production的缩写）

synonym.mean: 覆盖；胜过；给…戴帽；加盖于

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 给…戴帽；去蒂；覆以…；除去盖子；胜过（cap的过去分词形式）
无帽的；免盖的；无电容的
封口机；帽商；制造器具的盖子的人；诱饵；装盖的人；托儿

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指无边的便帽，呀表示职业的帽子，如运动帽、军帽等。
指有边的帽子，尤指礼帽。

word_group.brief_definition: 有帽檐的羊毛浅口男帽

bilingual.target: 现在是一顶红色的帽子。
看到那个戴帽子的男孩了吗？
你有一顶黄色的帽子吗？

bilingual.source: Mum, I can't find my new cap.
bilingual.target: 妈妈，我找不到我的新帽子了。

list.abstract: CAP美国病理学家协会（COLLEGE OF AMERICAN PATHOLOGISTS）是美国非赢利的临床实验室认可机构，它依据美国临床检验标准化委员会的业务标准和操作指南，以及1988年的美国临床实验室改进规范，对临床实验室各个学科的所有方面均制定了详细的检查单，通过严格要求来确保实验室符合质量标准，从而改进实验室的实际工作。CAP是一所通过推进和倡导病理及实验室医学的卓越实践，来服务于病人、病理学家和公众的领先机构。CAP致力于临床试验室步骤的标准化和改进；倡导高质量和经济有效的医疗保健服务，其所产生的影响超过了其他任何一个组织，因此被国际公认为是实验室质量保证的领导者和权威性的实验室管理和认证组织。CAP认证，是美国病理家协会举办的一种国际论证。

yingyinNormal.en: Let's put on our thinking cap, shall we?
yingyinNormal.zh: 让我们戴上智能帽子考虑一下吧，如何？

yingyinNormal.en: What the hell is this? How you doing sir? Hey, Cap. Captain. It's good to see you kid. God bless, sir.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这到底是怎么回事？你好，长官。嘿，“帽子”。上尉。很高兴看到你，孩子。上帝保佑，长官。
大杯卡布奇诺 三份牛奶，不要奶油。

yingyinNormal.en: Wear a baseball cap backwards to prove your point?
yingyinNormal.zh: 反戴棒球帽以证明你的改变吗？

yingyinNormal.en: That's not what I said. Tall cap triple-shot half caf?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我好像点的不是这个。小杯卡布奇诺 三份脱咖啡因对吧？

yingyinNormal.en: I don't know. Dead people's dresses? Yeah, and cap sleeve...
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个嘛。穿死人剩的衣服不太好吧？是啊，而且那超短袖……
一杯中杯双份卡布奇诺，脱脂奶。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, when I got my 100th cap for England, he said, "You've done well, boy."
yingyinNormal.zh: 嗯，当我第100次身披英格兰战袍出战时，他说"你踢得不错，孩子"。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《大卫·贝克汉姆：探索未知之境》

yingyinNormal.en: I'll have a tall cap, triple-shot half caf. Small scrap nipple slap half half.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要一杯小杯卡布奇诺，三份脱咖啡因。小屎尿屁一半一半。

yingyinNormal.en: In the polar regions, the permanent ice cap is melting as a result of global warming.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在南北两极终年不化的冰盖，正因为全球变暖而慢慢融化。

yingyinNormal.en: It's nice to see you're not still wearing that denim cap with all the little mirrors on it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 很高兴看到你不再戴那顶缀满小镜子的牛仔帽。

yingyinNormal.en: Broke up? Like a band? Like the Beatles? Cap and I fell out hard. We're not on speaking terms.
yingyinNormal.zh: 解散了？像乐队那样吗？像披头士那样吗？美国队长和我闹得很僵。我们现在不说话了。

yingyinNormal.en: Totally. What's wrong with cap sleeves? If you have the right figure for it, they're adorable.
yingyinNormal.zh: 说得好。超短袖有哪里不好了？只要身形适合，穿起来超卡哇伊啊。

yingyinNormal.en: Good, a polygraph can't be the sole basis for firing. So what? Cap my work off at five hours? Yeah. Okay.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一次测谎不能作为开除员工的唯一依据。那么，我这次有五个小时工时？行啊。好的。

yingyinNormal.en: We took action to offer millions of students a chance to cap their student loan payments at 10% of their income.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们还采取措施确保大学生每月的贷款还款额不超过其收入的10%，这将惠及数百万学子。

yingyinNormal.en: It's great to see you, Cap. You too, Rhodey. You guys really look like crap. Must've been a rough couple years. Yeah, well, the hotels weren't exactly five star.
yingyinNormal.zh: 见到你真高兴，队长。你也是，罗德。你们看上去状况真差。这几年很辛苦吧。是啊，没怎么住五星酒店。

yingyinNormal.en: So, Lisa tucks her hair up to a baseball cap, and we convince the grounds keeper that she's Justin Bieber and that Justin will take a picture with him. And it worked.
yingyinNormal.zh: 丽莎把头发卷到棒球帽里面，我们跟看场的人说她是贾斯汀·比伯，而那个贾斯汀会跟他合影，居然成功了！

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, come on, that can't be true. I did the research, Tony the Tiger, Dig'em the Frog, Cap'n Crunch, Toucan Sam, Count Chocula, Trix the Rabbit, Snap, Crackle and Pop.
yingyinNormal.zh: 拜托，才不可能呢。我真查过了，托尼老虎，青蛙，克朗奇船长，巨嘴鸟山姆，吸餐鬼伯爵，崔克斯兔，卜卜米三兄弟。

yingyinNormal.en: And I got you the commercials, got you the soaps, eventually got you a job paying you almost three million dollars a year, making you so famous that you could wear a ski cap when it is 80 degrees outside, and no one would say a damn thing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我给你接了广告，帮你接肥皂剧，我还帮你找到一份年薪三百万的工作，让你名声大噪，就算你在室外27度时戴着滑雪帽，也没人会说三道四。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: place a limit or restriction on (prices, expenditure, or other activity

examination_example.sentence: Yet the FCC also ended the investigations of broadband providers that imposed data <highlight>caps</highlight> on their rivals' streaming services but not their own.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，联邦通信委员会（FCC）也终止了对宽带供应商的调查，这些供应商对竞争对手的流媒体服务施加了数据上限，但对他们自己的服务却并未施加。

examination_example.sentence: George Osborne may introduce more flexibility to the current <highlight>cap</highlight> on the amount that local authorities can borrow against their housing stock debt.
examination_example.sentence_trans: George Osborne可能会对目前地方当局针对其住房存量债务的借款金额上限引入更大的灵活性。

examination_example.sentence: Evidence shows that 60,000 extra new homes could be built over the next five years if the <highlight>cap</highlight> were lifted.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有证据表明，如果取消（借贷）上限，未来五年可以额外建造6万套新房。

examination_example.sentence: Eight monumental curving staircases of granite are <highlight>capped</highlight> by four skylight domes and two stained glass rotundas.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 八个巨大的弧形花岗岩楼梯被四个天窗圆顶和两个彩色玻璃圆形大厅覆盖。

sense_info_list.en: put a lid or cover on; lie at the top of
provide a fitting climax or conclusion to

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: place a limit or restriction on (prices, expenditure, or other activity

examination_example.sentence: Actors are pushing for the idea of secondary compensation-a performance bonus every time a game sells 2 million copies, with a <highlight>cap</highlight> at 8 million.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 演员们正在推动第二补偿的想法——每卖出200万份游戏，就会得到一笔表演奖金，上限为800万份。

sense_info_list.en: put a lid or cover on; lie at the top of

examination_example.sentence: What are they thinking while they throw their <highlight>caps</highlight> in the air?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当他们把帽子扔向空中时，他们在想什么？

examination_example.sentence: A disappointing holiday season performance that <highlight>capped</highlight> a difficult year for department store chain facing wide-ranging challenges.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 令人失望的假日季表现为面临广泛挑战的百货连锁店艰难的一年打上了句号。

examination_example.sentence: For the next nine days, until the well was <highlight>capped</highlight>, the well poured out more oil than all the wells in America combined.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在接下来的九天里，在油井封顶之前，油井流出的石油甚至超过了美国所有油井的总和。

examination_example.sentence: Discover the unusual hats, <highlight>caps</highlight> and helmets worn by Royal Engineers!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 探索皇家工兵戴的不同寻常的帽子和头盔！

examination_example.sentence: This <highlight>cap</highlight> is nice, but it doesn't look good on me.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这顶帽子很好看，但我戴着不好看。
